pageContext.claim: “We're also standing up to social media censorship. That's the new thing.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear what Trump is talking about here. Social media networks have taken steps to regulate inaccurate news reports on their platforms to the dismay of some conservatives. As for the White House's "standing up" to these policies, Trump's economic advisor is "taking a look at" whether Google search results should be regulated after a pre-dawn presidential tweet, but no official policy or action has been announced.
